definition: an endorsement made in a passport that allows the bearer to enter the country issuing it, to approve officially
details:
noun
- an endorsement made in a passport that allows the bearer to enter the country issuing it
= example: an endorsement made in a passport that allows the bearer to enter the country issuing it
verb
- to approve officially
= example: to approve officially
- to provide with a visa
= example: to provide with a visa
